name: Man In Misery
description:
Welcome to "Save the Man in Misery"

This is a casual time killer game for you to play ...

Don't mind the graphics since this game is submission for "I Can't Draw Jam" ... I HAD to make this game in such bad graphics  this is an excuse for my bad art skills ... 

In this game you control a man who is trapped in a well with a bucket ...

Soon it starts to rain ...

To save yourself you must collect the rain and throw out of the well ...

You have no way out ...

Survive as long as you can ...

Controls:

W / Key Up              -        Jump

A / Key Left             -        Run Left

D / Key Right          -       Run Right

Space                          -       Throw water

Installation Instructions :

Simply Extract and Execute or Run.

You may be shown by your Operating System that "App may be harmful". 

But trust me I'm sending no malware so be sure and feel free to play.

My high score was 1354 seconds ... Tweet me your High Score with #survived_with_man_in_misery
